title: FO-05: Foundation & Navigation
description:
Create FO-05 directory structure and add to navigation

## Context

**Spec:** `docs/projects/2026-01-25-fo-05/2026-01-25-fo-05-spec.md`

**Key files for this epic:**
- `nav.config.ts` - Navigation configuration to add FO-05 entry
- `app/overview/page.tsx` - Overview page to add FO-05 card
- `app/fo-04/` - Reference implementation to copy structure from
notes:
2026-01-24 08:08 - Key insight: FO-05 page.tsx currently imports FOExperience from fo-04/components. Future tasks will need to create FO-05-specific components or configure FOExperience to handle the sentence fragment UX. The layout pattern is identical to FO-04.
2026-01-24 08:11 - FO-05 nav entry follows same pattern as FO-01-04. Added to three places in overview: versions array, and comparison table (needed border class update on FO-04 row to maintain styling consistency).
